fieldset.name: general
fieldset.label: General
fieldset.description: Specific settings for the front-end views are found under the 'List Layouts' and 'Item Layouts' tabs. Most settings can be set separately for books, reviews, people & characters. Most global settings can be overridden in the menu paramters for each view.

field.name: showcatsnote
field.label: Show Categories ad tags (site) global settings
field.description: This provides a quick way to disable categories and or tags on the entire xbBooks front end. A setting of 'No' here will override all other global and menu settings. Categories and Tags will still show on the admin side, and could still be used for menu filtering but will be transpent to the front end visitor.

field.name: starsnote
field.label: Rating settings
field.description:
xbFilmss uses a 7 point scale (1 to 7 stars) for ratings (see blog article). There is an option for a zero rating for items that were so dreadful that they should never have been written or seen.
You can choose a FontAwesome or IcoMoon icon to use for zero and stars. For FontAwesome include both parts of the class "fa fa-star", for IcoMoon include "icon-" before the icon name. You can also use any UTF8 character by defining a custom class and specifying the character in the after: selector for it.

field.name: zero_rating
field.label: Start ratings at zero
field.description: Allow minimum rating to be zero stars, otherwise one star is minimum and zero rating will not display

field.name: zero_class
field.label: Zero icon class
field.description: Enter CSS class name to use for a zero icon. Default "fas fa-thumbs-down xbred". For UTF8 chars define a custom class with the character in the :after selector, for IcoMoon include the "icon-" before the name.

field.name: star_class
field.label: Star icon class
field.description: Enter CSS class name to use for a star icon. Default "fa fa-star". For UTF8 chars define a custom class with the character in the :after selector, for IcoMoon include the "icon-" before the name.

field.name: halfstar_class
field.label: Half star class
field.description: Enter CSS class name to use for a half star icon. Default "fa fa-star-half". For UTF8 chars define a custom class with the character in the :after selector, for IcoMoon include the "icon-" before the name.

field.name: itemsnote
field.label: Item Defaults
field.description: Set various defaults for each type of item. These will apply to both lists and item views on the front end. They can be changed at the individual menu level. NB the Sho Category and Show Tag settings are overriden by the global settings above.

field.name: show_bcat
field.label: Show Book Category
field.description: If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden in list view

field.name: show_btags
field.label: Show Book Tags
field.description: Show tags in Category & Tags column. If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden

field.name: show_rcat
field.label: Show Review Category
field.description: If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden in list view

field.name: show_rtags
field.label: Show Review Tags
field.description: Show tags in Category & Tags column. If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden

field.name: show_pcat
field.label: Show Person Category
field.description: If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden in list view

field.name: show_ptags
field.label: Show Person Tags
field.description: Show tags in Category & Tags column. If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden

field.name: show_ccat
field.label: Show Character Category
field.description: If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden in list view

field.name: show_ctags
field.label: Show Character Tags
field.description: Show tags in Category & Tags column. If both Show Category and Show Tag are no the the column will be hidden

fieldset.name: admin
fieldset.label: Admin (Back-end) Options
fieldset.description: Options for front-end list views. Most of these global options can be overridden by specific menu settings.

field.name: beernote
field.label: Hide the credit footer - Roger's Beer
field.description:
If you make a small donation (£4 - enough for a beer) then you will get a phrase to enter on the xbPeople|Options|Beer tab that will hide the credit at the bottom of pages on site and admin for all xbCulture components.
Use the PayPal button at the foot of any admin page, or visit crosborne.uk/xbculture/beer. Of course you could simply hack the code to remove it but that would probably waste more that £4 of your time, and make you a bit of a nasty person.

field.name: xbpeoplenote
field.label: xbPeople Reminder
field.description: Setting this to 'No' will simply hide the reminder on the Control Panel.

field.name: pathnote
field.label: Image Paths
field.description: These set the default folders for posters and pictures. This is only used as the starting point when inserting images, you can then navigate to any other folder under /images if you wish. The defaults are /images/xbfilms which is created on installation.

field.name: cover_path
field.label: Cover images folder
field.description: Default folder for image. This only constrains which folder is initially shown when selecting image, the full path is saved in database

field.name: portrait_path
field.label: Portrait images folder
field.description: Default folder for picture for people and characters. This only constrains which folder is initially shown when selecting image

field.name: newitemnote
field.label: New Items
field.description: These set the defaults for new items.

field.name: def_new_bookcat
field.label: New Book Category
field.description: Default category for all new items and imported books You can select a different category when creating an individual item, and a different default for a specific import. This just provides a general fallback - if not set it will default to 'Uncategorised'.

field.name: def_new_revcat
field.label: New Review Category
field.description: Default category for all new items and imported reviews. You can select a different category when creating an individual item, and a different default for a specific import. This just provides a general fallback - if not set it will default to 'Uncategorised'.

field.name: rev_auth
field.label: Reviewer name
field.description: Use user's name or username as default author for reviews. Can be overridden by entering a different name in Reviewer field

field.name: def_new_percat
field.label: New Person Category
field.description: Default category for all new items and imported people. You can select a different category when creating an individual item, and a different default for a specific import. This just provides a general fallback - if not set it will default to 'Uncategorised'.

field.name: people_sort
field.label: Name Order
field.description: In all views names are displayed as 'Firstnames Lastname'. List views can be sorted by Lastname or Firstname. This setting determines the order for name lists used in selectors (eg in seach/filter options) which will be listed alphabetically according to tis setting.

field.name: def_new_charcat
field.label: New Character Category
field.description: Default category for all new items and imported characters. You can select a different category when creating an individual item, and a different default for a specific import. This just provides a general fallback - if not set it will default to 'Uncategorised'.

field.name: extlink_target
field.label: External Link Target
field.description: Open external links in new tab/window or replace existing page. NB this only applies to links added in the 'External Links' field for Books and People.

fieldset.name: list
fieldset.label: JGLOBAL_LIST_LAYOUT_OPTIONS
fieldset.description: Options for front-end list views. Most of these global options can be overridden by specific menu settings.

field.name: show_bpiccol
field.label: Cover Column
field.description: Show book cover column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_bsumcol
field.label: Summary Column
field.description: Show summary column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_brevcol
field.label: Rating & Review Column
field.description: Show rating & reviews column by default - can override in menu options. If you are not using reviews you can hide them here and in the book details. See also the separate setting for the individual film display

field.name: hide_namesonly
field.label: Hide plain names
field.description: Hide people who only have names set. Will only show people who have picture, or dates, or summary, or nationality, or biography info.

field.name: show_ppiccol
field.label: Portrait Column
field.description: Show portrait column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_pdates
field.label: Show Dates
field.description: Show sortable column for dates (born, died).

field.name: show_psumcol
field.label: Summary Column
field.description: Show summary column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_books
field.label: Show Book List
field.description: Show list of books for each person as a simple count per role, count with mouseover popup list, a linked list in the column, or hide the column

field.name: show_cpiccol
field.label: Image Column
field.description: Show image column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_csumcol
field.label: Summary Column
field.description: Show summary column by default - can override in menu options

field.name: show_cat_desc
field.label: Show Description
field.description: Show category description column

field.name: show_clist_empty
field.label: Show Empty Categories
field.description: Show categories which have no items

field.name: show_cat_parent
field.label: Show Category parents
field.description: Show category hierarchy - requires showing empty categories, sort will be by parent then title

field.name: show_tag_desc
field.label: Show Description
field.description: show description column

field.name: show_tag_parent
field.label: Show Tag parents
field.description: show tag hierarchy - if shown sort will be by parent, then title

field.name: hide_empty
field.label: Hide empty fields
field.description: Hide empty fields or show labels for them. Showing empty fields will make the display consistent between items, but wastes space if you are not using some fields

field.name: booknote
field.label: Book View Options
field.description: These settings apply to the individual book view

field.name: show_bimage
field.label: Show Image
field.description: Show image, and in which position

field.name: show_brevs
field.label: Show Ratings/Reviews
field.description: Show rating & reviews. Show rating only will make review details inaccessible from this page.

field.name: revnote
field.label: Review View Options
field.description: These settings apply to the individual review view

field.name: show_rimage
field.label: Show Image
field.description: Show image, and in which position

field.name: show_pimage
field.label: Show Picture
field.description: Show picture of person with their name

field.name: charnote
field.label: Character View Options
field.description: These global options to do with images are common for both real people and characters

field.name: show_cimage
field.label: Show Picture
field.description: Show picture of character with their name

field.name: categorynote
field.label: Category View Options
field.description: Options for the Category view which lists all the items in a category.

field.name: show_catdesc
field.label: Show Description
field.description: Show category description under the name

field.name: tagnote
field.label: Tag View Options
field.description: Options for the Category view which lists all the items in a category.

field.name: show_tagdesc
field.label: Show Description
field.description: Show tag description under the name and above the lists,

fieldset.name: meta
fieldset.label: Metadata
fieldset.description: These options only affect the metadata for xbbooks pages. If they are left blank the defaults from System|Global Configuration|Site will be used.

field.name: metanote1
field.description: Default values/options specified below are only used when a new item is first saved. Once there is data in the metadata fields then that will be used. The individual 'Show' options below are used when the page is displayed whether or not data is present.

field.name: show_rights
field.label: Show Meta.rights
field.description: If no default is set below, or no value is entered for the item then the global system configurtion default will be used.

field.name: def_rights
field.label: Default Content Rights
field.description: Text to be copied to metadata Content Rights for item if left blank when saved. If both the item rights and this option are blank then the global setting will be used.

field.name: show_desc
field.label: Show Meta.description
field.description: If Yes and no value is entered for the item then the global system configurtion default will be used.

field.name: summary_metadesc
field.label: Summary to Description
field.description: Copy item summary to item metadata description if left blank when saved.

field.name: show_author
field.label: Show Meta.author
field.description: For review pages the reviewer name will be used, for book & people pages the created_by_alias will be used if set, if not the default below will be used. List pages will use the default below.

field.name: def_author
field.label: Default Author
field.description: Used for list views and single book/people pages if created_by_alias is blank.

field.name: metanote2
field.description: NB the Keywords metatag is pretty much deprecated now and you probably don't want to bother with this next option unless you have a particular reason.

field.name: show_keywords
field.label: Show Meta.keywords
field.description: If you are using meta keywords you have the option below to copy tags to the keywords when the item is created

field.name: tags_keywords
field.label: Tags to Keywords
field.description: Copy tags for item to metadata keywords. NB this only works when there is nothing already in the Keyword field

field.name: metanote3
field.description: Joomla inserts a default 'generator' metatag [Joomla! - Open Source Content Management] on all pages. You can change it here for xbBooks pages only. To change it globally use a separate extension.

field.name: def_generator
field.label: Meta.generator
field.description: Leave blank to remove the generator tag.
